meanings.sent1: I can't believe those slimeballs lied to us.
meanings.sent2: Watch out for slimeballs who try to cheat you.
meanings.sent3: The slimeballs thought they could fool everyone, but they were wrong.
meanings.sent4: He was a true slimeball, always looking for ways to deceive others.
meanings.sent5: The town was full of slimeballs who couldn't be trusted.

meanings.sent1: The pond was covered in green slimeballs.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally stepped on a pile of slimeballs in the swamp.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a touch of slimeballs to the soup for extra texture.
meanings.sent4: The slimeballs oozed out of the container, leaving a trail behind.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the properties of the strange slimeballs.
